thread.section_title: Hotel Santa Costanza - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Vincent Kerry Ireland
thread.title_full: Vincent Kerry Ireland - Review of Hotel Santa Costanza, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Kindom I
title: Vincent Kerry Ireland
text: Ive Stayed from 13/02/17 to the 16/02/17 from start to finish i experienced a first class service all staff were verry helpful eg requested a [eletric kittle] and they dropped on up to my room.Had a lot of plans of places i want to see counter staff ansered all questions about best way to travel [Metro - Bus] 2 metro stations near bye [mind the pickpots] advise you to use hotel room safe 10 euro deposit which you will be given back when leaving ps [all hotel have to charge 6euros per head per night wherever you stay goverment tax]Breakfast plentful differnt fom our own but good.Brilliant Momart cafe 12 euro full cavery plus a glass of wine.overall i recomend 100% but do your home work before eg 72 hour public transport pass 18 euros for Metro/Bus/Tram/ ect ect'
